item.title: Monte Carlo Casino
item.description: Several days ago, I was playing a chinese card game with a bunch of friends and I wondered what were the different odds of obtaining certain set of cards. So instead of calculating these probabilities, why not just simulate them ? The card game Let me explain here how this game is played. We start with a shuffled deck of 52 cards and distribute them to 4 players in a row, eventually everyone will have 13 cards.
